conversations.content: Copy the config.json file to config.backup.json

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732101000000_k1l2m3n4o", "workspaceId": "ws_1732101000000_p5q6r7s8t", "sessionDescription": "Backing up config before changes", "sessionMemory": "User preparing to update critical application configuration. Created previous backups for version 1.0 and 1.1. This backup will enable safe rollback if new settings cause issues.", "toolContext": "Creating backup before modifications to ensure configuration can be restored if new settings cause issues. Duplicating enables safe experimentation with config values.", "primaryGoal": "Safely update configuration settings", "subgoal": "Create backup copy for rollback capability"}, "sourcePath": "/config.json", "targetPath": "/config.backup.json"}
I need to update the session details for tracking migration progress in my current workspace

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732101200000_m3n4o5p6q", "workspaceId": "ws_1732101200000_r7s8t9u0v", "sessionDescription": "Updating session to track migration work", "sessionMemory": "User started migration project yesterday. Created 12 data mappings, validated 8 of them. Current workspace contains 4 source systems and 3 target environments. Session tracks specific migration steps completed.", "toolContext": "Updating session metadata to reflect current migration status. Adding description enables accurate tracking of work progress and helps resume session from correct checkpoint.", "primaryGoal": "Track migration project progress", "subgoal": "Add detailed migration status description"}, "sessionId": "session_1732000000000_m4i5g6r7a", "description": "Migration tracking session with data mappings and validation progress"}
The export path is missing. Please create the /exports directory so we can save our data files there

tool_call: vaultManager_createFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732101600000_q7r8s9t0u", "workspaceId": "ws_1732101600000_v1w2x3y4z", "sessionDescription": "Creating exports folder", "sessionMemory": "User discovered missing export path during data export workflow. Workspace currently has Archive, Projects, and Drafts folders but no exports directory. Creating this folder enables batch data export of 47 filtered records.", "toolContext": "Creating missing /exports directory enables data export workflow to proceed. Without this directory, export operations fail. New folder will store all data output files for backup and distribution.", "primaryGoal": "Enable reliable data export functionality", "subgoal": "Create exports folder to store export files"}, "path": "/exports"}

Workspace has been configured with access to 3 model providers. Previous session used GPT-4 but budget constraints may require switching to smaller model. Need to review all options.", "toolContext": "Listing all available models to evaluate capabilities and cost/performance tradeoffs. Model selection affects both task quality and resource usage. Review enables informed choice for current project.", "primaryGoal": "Choose optimal model for text analysis", "subgoal": "List all available models to compare options"}}
Please analyze the current codebase structure and give me a summary of its organization

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732102100000_v2w3x4y5z", "workspaceId": "ws_1732102100000_a6b7c8d9e", "sessionDescription": "Running architecture analysis", "sessionMemory": "Codebase recently migrated from monolith to microservices. Previous architecture review identified 3 major modules needing refactoring. Current 15 modules distributed across services. Need updated structure summary to plan next refactoring phase.", "toolContext": "Executing analysis prompt with architecture agent to understand current code organization. Results guide refactoring decisions and identify problematic interdependencies. Structured analysis enables informed modernization planning.", "primaryGoal": "Understand complete codebase organization", "subgoal": "Generate architecture analysis from agent prompt"}, "prompt": "Analyze the current codebase structure"}
I need to set up agents for my workspace. Can you create a general-purpose assistant agent to help with common tasks?

User previously managed tasks manually, requiring repeated context setup. Creating general assistant agent will streamline common operations. Plan to add specialized agents for specific domains.", "toolContext": "Creating initial general-purpose agent to establish agent infrastructure. General assistant enables automation of common tasks and creates foundation for specialized agents. First agent marks transition from manual to automated operations.", "primaryGoal": "Build agent automation system for workspace", "subgoal": "Create general-purpose assistant agent"}, "name": "general-assistant", "description": "General purpose assistant for common tasks", "prompt": "You help with various workspace tasks"}
